RequestDes.GetVersion: Gets data about the current plugin and RPC version.

ParamsDes.availableRequests: Array of available RPC requests for the currently negotiated RPC version
ParamsDes.supportedImageFormats: Image formats available in GetSourceScreenshot and SaveSourceScreenshot requests.
ParamsDes.platform: Name of the platform. Usually windows, macos, or ubuntu (linux flavor). Not guaranteed to be any of those
ParamsDes.platformDescription: Description of the platform, like Windows 10 (10.0)
ParamsDes.sceneName: Name of the scene the item is in
ParamsDes.itemName: UUID of the scene the item is in
ParamsDes.sceneItemId: Numeric ID of the scene item
ParamsDes.sceneItemEnabled: New enable state of the scene item
